div.p: Melbourne Observatory Collection, Museum Victoria, Melbourne.

I have the honor to report to you that Trenches — evidently marking a line of Road — have been made from the N W entrance of, & through, the Government Domain S Melbourne by the Government Botanist; and that the line so laid out, abuts upon and cuts through nearly the middle of the Observatory Reserve — as proclaimed in the Government Gazette of the 15th of March last — in a way shewn on the accompanying tracing.

The Observatory reserve was trenched and marked according to the proclamation some time since — the trenching of the road has been done subsequently No regular road existed here previously and if it be allowed to become a roadway even for pedestrians the reserve will be untenable as the site for the Observatory. I trust therefore this line of road will not be sanctioned.
